content: TE-S SH Shanks Ultra-robust TE-S shanks for connecting tamping plates and bushing heads to a compatible breaker ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these chisel shanks especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our shanks are made to power through your most demanding tasks Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Connecting tamping and bushing heads to a compatible breaker Mounting tamper plates Mounting bushing heads Mounting rod driver heads For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Application: Compacting, Rod and stake driving, Surface preparation Length: 17.7 in Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Application | Compacting, Rod and stake driving, Surface preparation | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429814 - Shank TE-S SH 45 - Package Size 1 pc - 406786 - Shank TE-S SH 45 - Package Size 1 pc
